description: Non Material Amendment to Condition 1 (Approved Plans) of planning permission 22/02876/FUL (Redevelopment of the existing building (Class E use) to provide a 5 storey building with Class E floorspace at ground floor and 9no. residential units above with refuse/recycling facilities, cycle store and associated works) to replace reference to demolition drawings

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: DISIA Name: New Malden District Centre Inset Area
ART4 Name: New Malden District Centre Inset Area
NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP
VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Highways and Transport

decision_conditions: The approved development 22/02876/FUL shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:113_PL1_S_01 Rev P1 Site Location Plan 113_PH2_DE_01 RevA - Demolition West Elevation113_PH2_DE_02 RevA - Demolition East Elevation113_PH2_DE_03 RevA - Demolition South Elevation113_PH2_DS_01 RevA - Demolition Section113_PH2_DX_00 RevA - Demolition Ground Floor113_PH2_DX_01 RevA - Demolition First Floor Plan113_PH2_DX_02 RevA - Demolition Second Floor Plan113_PL1_FX_01 Rev C Proposed Fire Strategy First Floor Plan 113_PL1_FX_00 Rev C Proposed Fire Strategy Ground Floor Plan 113_PL1_FX_02 Rev C Proposed Fire Strategy Second Floor Plan 113_PL1_FX_03 Rev C Proposed Fire Strategy Third Floor Plan 113_PL1_FX_04 Rev C Proposed Fire Strategy Fourth Floor Plan 113_PL1_GA_02 Rev G Proposed Second Floor Plan 113_PL1_GA_03 Rev G Proposed Third Floor Plan 113_PL1_GA_04 Rev H Proposed Fourth Floor Plan 113_PL1_GA_RF Rev F Proposed Roof Plan F113_PL1_GE_02 Rev F Proposed East Elevation 113_PL1_GE_03 Rev F Proposed South Elevation 113_PL1_GS_03 Rev E Proposed Section CC 113_PL1_GE_04 Rev G Proposed North Elevation 113_PL1_GS_01 Rev E Proposed Section AA 113_PL1_GS_02 Rev E Proposed Section BB 113_PL1_GS_04 Rev E Proposed Section DD 113_PL1_GE_01 Rev I -Proposed West Elevation 113_PL1_GS_05 Rev E Proposed Section E 113_PL1_GA_01 Rev J - Proposed First Floor Plan Proposed Section FF 113_P1_GS_06 Rev A Proposed Ground Floor 113_PL1_GA_00 Rev I Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
The proposed amendments to planning permission 22/02876/FUL are considered to be non-material.
